roleset.name: cause to be or seem to be an animal, dehumanize
roleset.note: ANIMALIZE-V NOTES: Roleset based upon parallel expansion to VerbNet, PropBank, and sense groupings. Framed by Claire. (from animalize.01-v)

example.name: The only example I could find...
example.src: The only example I could find...
example.type: The only example I could find...
example.text: Rather than imposing human consciousness upon animal behaviors, he animalized consciousness in general.
